XXsspp2_2u:861: tathā hi nānyā dānapāramitānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva dānapāramitā
XXsspp2_2u:862: dānapāramitaivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate dānapāramitety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:864: śīlapāramitaivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate śīlapāramitety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:866: kṣāntipāramitaivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate kṣāntipāramitety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:868: vīryapāramitaivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate vīryapāramitety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:870: dhyānapāramitaivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate dhyānapāramitety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:872: prajñāpāramitaivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate prajñāpāramitety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_2u:874: evādhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'dhyātmaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā bahirdhāśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva bahirdhāśūnyatā
XXsspp2_2u:875: bahirdhāśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate bahirdhāśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda
XXsspp2_2u:876: evādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatety
XXsspp2_2u:877: advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā śūnyatāśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:878: anutpāda eva śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra (ŚsP II-2 55) paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate śūnyatāśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā mahāśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:879: anutpāda eva mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mahāśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā paramārthaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva paramārthaśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate paramārthaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā saṃskṛtaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda
XXsspp2_2u:880: evāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāsaṃskṛtaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyātyantaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda
XXsspp2_2u:881: evātyantaśūnyatātyantaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'tyantaśūnyatā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyānavarāgraśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evānavarāgraśūnyatā navarāgraśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate anavarāgraśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:883: anavakāraśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'navakāraśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:885: prakṛtiśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:887: sarvadharmaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:889: svalakṣaṇaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyānupalambhaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda
XXsspp2_2u:890: evānupalambhaśūnyatānupalambhaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'nupalambhaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyābhāvaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda (ŚsP II-2
XXsspp2_2u:891: 56) evābhāvaśūnyatābhāvaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'bhāvaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā svabhāvaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva svabhāvaśūnyatā
XXsspp2_2u:892: svabhāvaśūnyataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda
XXsspp2_2u:895: tathā hi nānyāni smṛtyupasthānāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānāny evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante smṛtyupasthānānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_2u:896: tathā hi nānyāni samyakprahāṇāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇāny evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante samyakprahāṇānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_2u:897: tathā hi nānya ṛddhipādā anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpādā eva ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādā
XXsspp2_2u:898: evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ima ucyante
XXsspp2_2u:899: ṛddhipādā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyānīndriyāṇy anyo
XXsspp2_2u:900: 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evendriyāṇīndriyāṇy evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante indriyāṇīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāni balāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva balāni
XXsspp2_2u:901: balāny evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante balānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāni bodhyaṅgāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgāny evānutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:902: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante bodhyaṅgānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānya āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:903: anutpāda evāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ āryāṣṭāṅgamārga evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'yam ucyata āryāṣṭāṅgamārga ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāny āryasatyāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evāryasatyāny āryasatyāny evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyanta āryasatyānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāni dhyānāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva dhyānāni dhyānāny
XXsspp2_2u:904: evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante
XXsspp2_2u:905: dhyānānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, (ŚsP II-2 57) tathā hi nānyāny
XXsspp2_2u:906: apramāṇāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evāpramāṇāny apramāṇāny evānutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:907: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante pramāṇānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:908: anutpāda evārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattaya evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad ima ucyante ārūpyasamāpattaya ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānye vimokṣā anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva vimokṣā vimokṣā evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ima ucyante vimokṣā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo 'nyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattaya evānutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:909: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante
XXsspp2_2u:910: 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattaya ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāny
XXsspp2_2u:911: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante
XXsspp2_2u:912: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā abhijñānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evābhijñā abhijñā evānutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:913: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yā imā ucyante abhijñā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānye samādhayo 'nyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:914: anutpāda eva samādhayaḥ samādhaya evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante samādhaya ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāni dhāraṇīmukhāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva dhāraṇīmukhāni
XXsspp2_2u:915: dhāraṇīmukhāny evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yānīmāny ucyante dhāraṇīmukhānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāni
XXsspp2_2u:918: yānīmāny ucyante tathāgatabalānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyāni vaiśāradyāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva vaiśāradyāni
XXsspp2_2u:919: vaiśāradyāny evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yānīmāny ucyante vaiśāradyānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyo
XXsspp2_2u:921: evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante
XXsspp2_2u:922: pratisaṃvida ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā mahāmaitry anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva mahāmaitrī mahāmaitry (ŚsP II-2 58) evānutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:923: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mahāmaitrīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā mahākaruṇā nyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:924: anutpāda eva mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇaivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mahākaruṇety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānya āveṇikabuddhadharmā anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evāveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmā evānutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:925: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante āveṇikabuddhadharmā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_2u:926: tathā hi nānyat srotaāpattiphalam anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpattiphalam evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate śrotraāpattiphalam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyat sakṛdāgāmiphalam anyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:927: anutpāda eva sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate sakṛdāgāmiphalam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyad anāgāmiphalam anyo 'nutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:928: anutpāda evānāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate 'nāgāmiphalam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyad arhattvam anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda evārhattvam arhattvam evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa
XXsspp2_2u:929: yad etad ucyate 'rhattvam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā
XXsspp2_2u:930: pratyekabodhir anyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabodhir
XXsspp2_2u:931: evānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'yam ucyate pratyekabodhir ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā sarvajñatānyo
XXsspp2_2u:932: 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva sarvajñatā sarvajñataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate sarvajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā mārgākārajñatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mārgākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, tathā hi nānyā sarvākārajñatānyo 'nutpādaḥ, anutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā
XXsspp2_2u:934: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_2u:936: athāyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yasmin samaye bhagavan
XXsspp2_2u:937: bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam
XXsspp2_2u:938: upaparīkṣate, tasmin samaye bhagavan rūpasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, vedanāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām
XXsspp2_2u:939: upādāya, saṃjñāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
XXsspp2_2u:942: cakṣuṣo 'nutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, śrotrasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, ghrāṇasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, jihvāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām
XXsspp2_2u:943: upādāya, kāyasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, manaso
XXsspp2_2u:945: rūpasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, śabdasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, gandhasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, rasasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām
XXsspp2_2u:946: upādāya, sparśasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, dharmāṇām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
XXsspp2_2u:961: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
XXsspp2_2u:962: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā (ŚsP II-2 60) anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
XXsspp2_2u:963: pṛthivīdhātor anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, abdhātor anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, tejodhātor anutpādaṃ paśyaty
XXsspp2_2u:968: avidyāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, saṃskārāṇām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, vijñānasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, nāmarūpasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām
XXsspp2_2u:970: sparśasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, vedanāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, tṛṣṇāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty
XXsspp2_2u:972: upādāya, bhavasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, jāter anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, jarāmaraṇasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
XXsspp2_2u:990: upādāya, prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
XXsspp2_2u:999: ṛddhipādānām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, indriyāṇām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, balānām anutpādaṃ paśyaty
XXsspp2_2u:1001: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, āryasatyānām anutpādaṃ paśyaty
XXsspp2_2u:1002: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, dhyānānām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām
XXsspp2_2u:1003: upādāya, apramāṇānām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
XXsspp2_2u:1007: śūnyatānimittepraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, abhijñānām anutpādaṃ paśyaty
XXsspp2_2u:1024: 'nutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, anāgāmino 'nutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, arhato 'nutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, pratyekabuddhasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
XXsspp2_2u:1031: buddhasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, buddhadharmāṇām anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām
XXsspp2_2u:1032: athāyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yathāham āyuṣmataḥ subhūter bhāṣitasyārtham
XXsspp2_2u:1033: rūpam anutpādaḥ, vedanām anutpādaḥ, saṃjñām anutpādaḥ, saṃskārā anutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1035: cakṣur anutpādaḥ, śrotram anutpādaḥ, ghrāṇam anutpādaḥ, jihvānutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1037: rūpam anutpādaḥ, śabdo 'nutpādaḥ, gandho 'nutpādaḥ, raso 'nutpādaḥ, sparśo
XXsspp2_2u:1040: anutpādaḥ, jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ, kāyavijñānam anutpādaḥ, manovijñānam
XXsspp2_2u:1050: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādaḥ, abdhātur anutpādaḥ, tejodhātur anutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1051: vāyudhātur anutpādaḥ, ākāśadhātur anutpādaḥ, vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1052: avidyānutpādaḥ, saṃskārā anutpādaḥ, vijñānam anutpādaḥ, nāmarūpam
XXsspp2_2u:1054: tṛṣṇānutpādaḥ, upādānam anutpādaḥ, bhavo 'nutpādaḥ, jātir anutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1068: anutpādaḥ, indriyāṇy anutpādaḥ, balāny anutpādaḥ, bodhyaṅgāny anutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1069: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpādaḥ, āryasatyāny anutpādaḥ, catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaḥ, catvāry apramāṇāny anutpādaḥ, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣā anutpādaḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
XXsspp2_2u:1073: anutpādaḥ, catvāri vaiśāradyāny anutpādaḥ, catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādaḥ, mahāmaitry anutpādaḥ, mahākaruṇānutpādaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1082: yadi vāyuṣman subhūte rūpam anutpādaḥ, vedanām anutpādaḥ, saṃjñām
XXsspp2_2u:1084: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1085: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo
XXsspp2_2u:1087: cakṣurvijñānam anutpādaḥ, śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1091: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1092: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1093: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam
XXsspp2_2u:1094: anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo jātir anutpādo jarāmaraṇam anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1096: adhyātmaśūnyatānutpādo bahirdhāśūnyatānutpādo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānutpādaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatānutpādo mahāśūnyatānutpādaḥ paramārthaśūnyatānutpādaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo
XXsspp2_2u:1101: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny anutpādaś catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaś catvāry
XXsspp2_2u:1102: apramāṇāny anutpāda catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādo aṣṭau vimokṣānutpādo navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
XXsspp2_2u:1104: 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ daśatathāgatabalāny anutpādaś catvāri vaiśāradyāny anutpādaś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpādo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1111: anutpādaḥ, buddho 'py anutpādaḥ, buddhadharmā apy anutpādaḥ. tat prāptam eva bhavati śrāvakayāṇikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāptaiva bhavati, pratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ pratyekabodhiḥ prāptaiva bhavati, bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ bhede na bhaviṣyati prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahasattvena pañcavidhā bodhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1112: yady āyuṣman subhūte sarvadharmā anutpādaḥ, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ srotaāpannena
XXsspp2_2u:1113: trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ, sakṛdāgāminā rāgadveṣamohānāṃ tanutvāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ, anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ, arhatā pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1114: pratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ pratyekabodhaye mārgo bhāvitaḥ? kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāñ carati yad duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ kṛtane pratyanubhavati? kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
XXsspp2_2u:1115: abhisaṃbuddhā, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitam?
XXsspp2_2u:1117: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpādasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi na samayaṃ cānutpādasya srotaāpattitvam icchāmi, srotaāpattiphalaṃ nānutpādasya sakṛdāgāmitvam icchāmi, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyānāgāmitvam icchāmi
XXsspp2_2u:1119: nānutpādasya pratyekabuddhatvam icchāmi na pratyekabodhir nāpy aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrecchāmi yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāṃ caran nāpi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_2u:1120: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ janayitvāśakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kartum api tv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvattveyumātṛsaṃjñā janayitvā pitṛsaṃjñāṃ janayitvā putrasaṃjñā janayitvāsakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthakartun tac cānupalambhayogena evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
XXsspp2_2u:1121: yathātmātmeti cocyate sa ca sarveṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_2u:1123: evam adhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃjñotpādayitavyā, saced evaṃ saṃjñām
XXsspp2_2u:1124: utpādayitavyeti duṣkarasaṃjñām utpadayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na
XXsspp2_2u:1125: sa kaccit tad dharmam utpādayati nopalabhyate nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpāde tathāgatam icchāmi nānuttarā saṃyaksaṃbodhir yathā tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ na hy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptiḥ prāpyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1126: āha: kim punas tvam āyuṣman subhūte utpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi?
XXsspp2_2u:1128: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpānnena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi nāpy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāpyamāṇām.
XXsspp2_2u:1129: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1130: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punaḥ paramārthena dharmeṇa.
XXsspp2_2u:1131: api tu khalu punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptir abhisamayo vā prajñāpyate lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā nāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā prajñayate. na punaḥ paramārthena prāptir vābhisamayo vā srotaāpanno vā (ŚsP II-2 67)
XXsspp2_2u:1132: sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1133: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ
XXsspp2_2u:1135: āha: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ
XXsspp2_2u:1136: paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paramārtheṇa karmaṇaḥ karamavipākaḥ, notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1137: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte 'nutpanno dharma utpadyate, atha votpanno dharma utpadyate?
XXsspp2_2u:1138: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya dharmasyotpādam
XXsspp2_2u:1140: āha: katamasyāyuṣman subhūte anutpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
XXsspp2_2u:1141: subhūtir āha: rūpasyāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, vedanāyā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, saṃjñāyā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1146: svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, ghrāṇasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1148: necchāmi, manaso 'ham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1151: svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, gandhasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya (ŚsP II-2 68) svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1156: cakṣurvijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, śrotravijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1157: ghrāṇavijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāvijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1158: kāyavijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, manovijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1159: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, śrotrasaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1160: ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāsaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1161: kāyasaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, manaḥsaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1162: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1163: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1164: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1165: pṛthivīdhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, abdhātor aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1167: tejodhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, vāyudhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, ākāśadhātor aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1168: chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, vijñānadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1169: avidyāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1170: necchāmi, saṃskārāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, vijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, nāmarūpasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1174: chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, tṛṣṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1181: dānapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, śīlapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, kṣāntipāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1183: vīryapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, dhyānapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, prajñāpāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1185: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, bahirdhāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1187: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā (ŚsP II-2 70) aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1188: śūnyatāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, mahāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, paramārthaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1190: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1192: atyantaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, anavarāgraśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1194: anavakāraśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, prakṛtiśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1196: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, anupalambhaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1198: abhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, svabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1200: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1201: smṛtyupasthānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, samyakprahāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, ṛddhipādānām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1202: chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, indriyāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1203: balānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1204: necchāmi, bodhyaṅgānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, āryasatyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām (ŚsP II-2 71)
XXsspp2_2u:1205: utpādaṃ necchāmi, dhyānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, apramāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1207: ārūpyasamāpattīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, vimokṣāṇām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1209: anupūrvavihārasamāpattlnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1210: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, abhijñānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1211: samādhīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, dhāraṇīmukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1212: tathāgatabalānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, vaiśāradyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, pratisaṃvidām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1213: chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, mahāmaitryā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1214: mahākaruṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyām utpādaṃ necchāmi, āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1216: srotaāpattiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, sakṛdāgāmiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya
XXsspp2_2u:1217: svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, anāgāmiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, arhattvasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1218: pratyekabodher aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, sarvajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, mārgākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1220: sarvākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 72) chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1221: āha: katamasya tvam āyuṣman subhūte utpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
XXsspp2_2u:1223: necchāmi, vedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, saṃjñāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, saṃskārāṇām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1224: chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, vijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1228: putrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1229: chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, kāyasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, manaso
XXsspp2_2u:1233: svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, gandhasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, rasasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1235: necchāmi, dharmāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1236: cakṣurvijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, śrotravijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1237: ghrāṇavijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāvijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1239: svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, manovijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1240: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, śrotrasaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1241: ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāsaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1242: kāyasaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, manaḥsaṃsparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1243: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1244: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1245: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1246: pṛthivīdhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, abdhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, tejodhātor aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1247: chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, vāyudhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1248: ākāśadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, vijñānadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1249: avidyāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1250: necchāmi, saṃskārāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, vijñānasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, nāmarūpasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1254: chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, tṛṣṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1261: dānapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, śīlapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, kṣāntipāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1262: chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, vīryapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1263: dhyānapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, prajñāpāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
XXsspp2_2u:1264: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, bahirdhāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1266: śūnyatāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, mahāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, paramārthaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1268: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, atyantaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1270: anavarāgraśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1271: anavakāraśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, prakṛtiśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā (ŚsP II-2 75) aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1272: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, anupalambhaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1273: chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, abhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1274: svabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1276: smṛtyupasthānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, samyakprahāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, ṛddhipādānām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1277: chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, indriyāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1278: balānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1279: necchāmi, bodhyaṅgānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, āryasatyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1280: dhyānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1281: necchāmi, apramāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, ārūpyasamāpattīnām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1282: chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, vimokṣāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1283: anupūrvavihārasamāpattinām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1284: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, abhijñānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1285: samādhīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1286: necchāmi, dhāraṇīmukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1288: tathāgatabalānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, vaiśāradyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, pratisaṃvidām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1289: chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, mahāmaitryā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1290: mahākaruṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyām utpādaṃ necchāmi, āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1292: srotaāpattiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi, sakṛdāgāmiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya
XXsspp2_2u:1293: svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, anāgāmiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi, arhattvasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1294: pratyekabodher aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
XXsspp2_2u:1295: sarvajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1296: necchāmi, mārgākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi, sarvākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1298: śāradvatīputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate?
XXsspp2_2u:1300: āha: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpāda utpadyate, nānutpāda utpadyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1301: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cotpādo yaś cānutpāda ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ. tad anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate, nānutpāda utpadyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1302: śāradvatīputra āha: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti te mantrayitum, anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo hy āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum.
XXsspp2_2u:1303: subhūtir āha: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 77)
XXsspp2_2u:1304: chāradvatīputra yac ca pratibhāti te mantrayitum iti, anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na me pratibhāti mantrayitum,
XXsspp2_2u:1305: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo 'pi me āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yaś cānutpādo yac ca pratibhānaṃ ye ca mantrā yā cānutpattiḥ sarvadharmā ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā
XXsspp2_2u:1307: āha: anutpāda ity āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ, anutpādaṃ pratibhānaṃ, anutpādo
XXsspp2_2u:1308: dharmaḥ, te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
XXsspp2_2u:1309: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra anutpādo mantro 'nutpādaḥ
XXsspp2_2u:1310: pratibhāno 'nutpādo dharmaḥ, te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpam anutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ saṃjñānutpādaḥ saṃskārānutpādo vijñānam
XXsspp2_2u:1312: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1313: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo
XXsspp2_2u:1315: cakṣurvijñānam anutpādaḥ, śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1319: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1320: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1322: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam
XXsspp2_2u:1323: anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo jātir anutpādo jarāmaraṇam anutpādaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1325: adhyātmaśūnyatānutpādo bahirdhāśūnyatānutpādo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānutpādaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatānutpādo mahāśūnyatānutpādaḥ paramārthaśūnyatānutpādaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo
XXsspp2_2u:1330: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny anutpādo dhyānāny anutpādo 'pramāṇāny anutpāda ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādo vimokṣānutpādo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
XXsspp2_2u:1333: 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ tathāgatabalāny anutpādo vaiśāradyāny anutpādaḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpāda
XXsspp2_2u:1336: anutpādo 'rhattvam anutpādaḥ pratyekabodhir anutpādaḥ, sarvajñatānutpādo mārgākārajñatānutpādaḥ
XXsspp2_2u:1337: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇānutpādo mantro 'nutpādaṃ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmaḥ, te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti
XXsspp2_2u:1339: āha: dharmakathikānām agratāyām ayam āyuṣman subhūtiḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripṛcchyate tatas
XXsspp2_2u:1341: subhūtir āha: dharmataiṣāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakānām aniśritānāṃ sarvadharmeṣu te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante (ŚsP II-2 79)
XXsspp2_2u:1342: tatas tata eva niḥsaranti. tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tad aniśritatvāt
XXsspp2_2u:1345: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1346: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1347: antareṇopalabhyate, saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antreṇopalabhyate, vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1348: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1349: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, ghrāṇam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1350: jihvāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, kāya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
XXsspp2_2u:1351: prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1352: antareṇopalabhyate, mana āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1353: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, śabda āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito
XXsspp2_2u:1354: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, gandha āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, rasa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, sparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito (ŚsP
XXsspp2_2u:1355: II-2 80) nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, dharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
XXsspp2_2u:1356: prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1358: cakṣurvijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, śrotravijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1360: prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1361: antareṇopalabhyate, jihvāvijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1362: kāyavijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, manovijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1364: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, śrotrasaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito
XXsspp2_2u:1366: prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1367: antareṇopalabhyate, jihvāsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1368: kāyasaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniḥśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, manaḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito
XXsspp2_2u:1370: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1371: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1372: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1373: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1374: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 81) chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1375: antareṇopalabhyate, manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1377: pṛthivīdhātur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, abdhātur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito
XXsspp2_2u:1379: prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1380: antareṇopalabhyate, vāyudhātur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1381: ākāśadhātur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, vijñānadhātur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito
XXsspp2_2u:1383: avidyāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā
XXsspp2_2u:1385: prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1386: antareṇopalabhyate, nāmarūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1387: ṣaḍāyatanam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, sparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito
XXsspp2_2u:1388: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1389: tṛṣṇāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam atareṇopalabhyate, upādānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1390: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, bhava āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, jātir āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, jarāmaranam āyuṣmañ (ŚsP 82) chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1391: dānapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, śīlapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, kṣāntipāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1392: antareṇopalabhyate, vīryapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1393: dhyānapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, prajñāpāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1394: adhyātmaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, bahirdhāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1395: antareṇopalabhyate, śūnyatāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1396: mahāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, paramārthaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1397: antareṇopalabhyate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1398: atyantaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, anavarāgraśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, anavakāraśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1399: antareṇopalabhyate, prakṛtiśūnyatāyuṣman chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā (ŚsP II-2 83) nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1401: sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1402: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, anupalambhaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, abhāvaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1403: antareṇopalabhyate, svabhāvaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1404: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1405: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1406: samyakprahāṇāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1407: ṛddhipādā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, indriyāṇy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, balāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, bodhyaṅgāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āyuṣmañ
XXsspp2_2u:1408: chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
XXsspp2_2u:1409: prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1410: antareṇopalabhyate, dhyānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1411: apramāṇāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, vimokṣā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā
XXsspp2_2u:1413: 84) chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritā
XXsspp2_2u:1414: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, abhijñā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā
XXsspp2_2u:1416: prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1417: antareṇopalabhyate, dhāraṇīmukhāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1418: tathāgatabalāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1419: vaiśāradyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1420: pratisaṃvida āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, mahāmaitry āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā
XXsspp2_2u:1422: sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1423: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1424: srotaāpattiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1425: sakṛdāgāmiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1426: anāgāmiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, arhattvam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1428: prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam
XXsspp2_2u:1429: antareṇopalabhyate, sarvajñatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_2u:1430: mārgākārajñatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, sarvākārajñatāyuṣmañ (ŚsP
XXsspp2_2u:1431: II-2 85) chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_2u:1432: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā aniśritāḥ prakṛtiśūnyām
XXsspp2_2u:1434: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā rūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ, vedanā pariśodhayitavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1438: pariśodhayitavyaṃ, jihvā pariśodhayitavyā, kāyaḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ, manaḥ
XXsspp2_2u:1454: pṛthivīdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo 'bdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ tejodhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vāyudhātuḥ pariśodhayitavya ākāśadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vijñānadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1457: pariśodhayitavyaṃ, sparśaḥ pariśodhayitavyo vedanā pariśodhayitavyā, tṛṣṇā
XXsspp2_2u:1458: pariśodhayitavyā, (ŚsP II-2 86) upādānaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ, bhavaḥ pariśodhayitavyo jātiḥ pariśodhayitavyā, jarāmaraṇaṃ pariśodhayitavyam.
XXsspp2_2u:1473: pariśodhayitavyāni, bodhyaṅgāni pariśodhayitavyāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ, āryasatyāni pariśodhayitavyāni, dhyānāni
XXsspp2_2u:1484: athāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra punar āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1486: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā laukiky asti (ŚsP
XXsspp2_2u:1487: II-2 87) lokottarāsti, śīlapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarāsti,
XXsspp2_2u:1488: kṣāntipāramitā laukiky asti lokottarāsti, vīryapāramitā laukiky asti
XXsspp2_2u:1489: lokottarāsti, dhyānapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarāsti, prajñāpāramitā laukiky asti lokottarāsti.
XXsspp2_2u:1490: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā?
XXsspp2_2u:1491: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dātā bhavati dānapatiḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakāyācanakebhyaḥ, annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ puṣpārthikebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthikebhyo gandhaṃ gandhārthikebhyo vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikebhya upāśrayam upāśrayārthikebhya
XXsspp2_2u:1492: śayyāsanaṃ śayyāsanārthikebhya upakaraṇam upakaraṇārthikebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ bhaiṣajyārthikebhyaḥ, yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāpariṣkārān dadāti putrārthikebhyaḥ putraṃ dadāti duhitṛkārthikebhyo duhitṛn dadāti bhāryārthikebhyo bhāryāṃ dadāti rājyārthikebhyo rājyaṃ dadāti,
XXsspp2_2u:1493: śiro'rthikebhyaḥ śiro dadāti, nayanārthikebhyo nayanaṃ dadāti,
XXsspp2_2u:1494: aṅgapratyaṅgārthikebhyo 'ṅgaṃ dadāti, māṃsaśoṇitamajjārthikebhyo māṃsaśoṇitamajjān dadāti, tac ca saṃniśritaḥ parityajati tasyaivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ dadāmy eṣa pratigrhṇāti, idaṃ dānam ahaṃ dātā, ahaṃ dānapatir ahaṃ sarvāstiparityāgī, ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi, ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi, tac ca dānaṃ datvopalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dānaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti, sa triṣu saṃyogeṣu saktas tad dānaṃ dadāti, katameṣu
XXsspp2_2u:1495: triṣu? yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dānasaṃjñāyām eṣu triṣu saṃyogeṣu sakto dānaṃ dadāti. iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate laukikī dānapāramiteti? tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati, na ca saṃkrāmati tenocyate laukikī dānapāramitā.
XXsspp2_2u:1496: tatra katamā lokottarā dānapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1498: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvas tad dānaṃ dadann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhyate dānaṃ nopalabhyate vipākañ (ŚsP
XXsspp2_2u:1499: II-2 88) ca nābhinandati. iyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1500: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānaṃ dadāti sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad dānaṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokottarā dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti? tathā hi lokottareti lokā carati saṃkrāmati
XXsspp2_2u:1502: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śīlapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
XXsspp2_2u:1504: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati tac ca saṃniśrito bhavati tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham śīlaṃ rakṣāmi sattvānām arthāya.
XXsspp2_2u:1505: idam śīlam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi tac ca śīlaṃ rakṣann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me śīlaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmeṣu sukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tac chīlaṃ rakṣati yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ śīlasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī śīlapāramiteti. tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
XXsspp2_2u:1506: tatra katamā lokottarā śīlapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1508: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate śīlaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca tac chīlaṃ niryātayati. tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate
XXsspp2_2u:1509: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na
XXsspp2_2u:1510: samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā śīlapāramitā tathā hi lokā carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
XXsspp2_2u:1511: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kṣāntipāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
XXsspp2_2u:1513: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati, tāñ ca saṃniśrito bhavati, tasyaivaṃ bhavatv ahaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya, iyaṃ kṣāntir ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karoti tañ ca kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ (ŚsP II-2 89) sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayate, anena me kṣāntiphalenaite
XXsspp2_2u:1514: sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tā kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1515: parasaṃjñāyāṃ kṣāntisaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī kṣāntipāramiteti. tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
XXsspp2_2u:1516: tatra katamā lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1518: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate, vipākaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1519: nābhinandati, sarvasattvebhyaś ca tāṃ kṣāntiṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate, 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na
XXsspp2_2u:1520: samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā, tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
XXsspp2_2u:1521: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vīryapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
XXsspp2_2u:1523: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhate, tac ca saṃniśrita ārabhate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhate sarvasattvānām arthāya, ayaṃ kāya idaṃ cittam idaṃ vīryam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāñ carāmi tac ca vīryam upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati, anena me vīryaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavatv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas taṃ vīryam ārabhate, yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ vīryasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī
XXsspp2_2u:1524: vīryapāramiteti. tathā hi kokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad
XXsspp2_2u:1526: tatra katamā lokottarā vīryapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1528: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇa ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vīryaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad vīryaṃ niryatayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayañ cāpi ca nimittam na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā vīryapāramitā tathā hi (ŚsP II-2 90)
XXsspp2_2u:1529: lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
XXsspp2_2u:1530: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
XXsspp2_2u:1532: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, tac ca saṃniśritaḥ samāpadyate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyate
XXsspp2_2u:1533: sarvasattvānām arthāya, imāni dhyānāni, ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi tac ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāna upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1534: kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dhyānaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti, sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dhyānasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī dhyānapāramiteti, tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati, tad ucyate laukikīti.
XXsspp2_2u:1535: tatra katamā lokottarā dhyānapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1537: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānāni samāpadyamāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati,
XXsspp2_2u:1538: sarvasattvebhyaś ca tāni dhyānāni niryātayati, tāś ca sattvān
XXsspp2_2u:1539: nopalabhyate, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā dhyānapāramitā tathā hi lokāc carati
XXsspp2_2u:1541: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
XXsspp2_2u:1543: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayati, tāñ ca saṃniśrito bhāvayati sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayati, ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cārthāya
XXsspp2_2u:1544: sarvapuṇyam anumodyate sarvabuddhān adhyeṣate upalambhayogena tac ca sarvakuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupāyena tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya iyaṃ prajñā imāṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi. tāṃ ca prajñāṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati anena me prajñāphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhino
XXsspp2_2u:1545: bhavantv anutpādāya ca parinirvāntv iti, sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayanti, yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ prajñāsaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī (ŚsP II-2 91) prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokān na carati
XXsspp2_2u:1546: noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
XXsspp2_2u:1547: tatra katamā lokottarā prajñāpāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1549: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate prajñān nopalabhyate vipākaś ca nābhinandati, sarvasattvebhyaś ca prajñāṃ niryātayati, tāṃś ca sattvān
XXsspp2_2u:1550: nopalabhyate, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokāc caraty
XXsspp2_2u:1551: uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramiteti.
XXsspp2_2u:1552: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1553: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ?
XXsspp2_2u:1557: vīryapāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, dhyānapāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1561: śūnyatāśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, mahāśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, paramārthaśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
XXsspp2_2u:1563: atyantaśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, anavarāgraśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, anavakāraśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, prakṛtiśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
XXsspp2_2u:1566: anupalambhaśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, abhāvaśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, svabhāvaśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1567: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bodhisattvasya
XXsspp2_2u:1568: mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, catvāri ṛddhipādā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
XXsspp2_2u:1569: bodhimārgaḥ, pañcendriyāṇi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, pañca balāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, sapta bodhyaṅgāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo bodhisattvasya
XXsspp2_2u:1571: catvāry āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
XXsspp2_2u:1572: bodhimārgaḥ, catvāri dhyānāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1573: catvāry apramāṇāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
XXsspp2_2u:1578: daśatathāgatabalāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ, catvāri vaiśāradyāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
XXsspp2_2u:1582: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
XXsspp2_2u:1583: āha: sādhu sādhv āyuṣman subhūte katamasyā ayaṃ pāramitāyāḥ puruṣakāraḥ?
XXsspp2_2u:1584: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitāyā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāyaṃ puruṣakāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP II-2 93)
XXsspp2_2u:1585: janayitrī sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra parigrāhikā saṃgrāhikā sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra caritaiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ, anāgatā apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā atraiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. ye 'pi
XXsspp2_2u:1586: te āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti, te 'pīhaiva
XXsspp2_2u:1588: sacet punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā veditavyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇāya sarvasattvānām aparityāgatāyai tac cānupalambhayogena viharaty ayaṃ
XXsspp2_2u:1589: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena manasikāreṇa yad uta mahākaruṇā manasikārena.
XXsspp2_2u:1590: āha: viharatum āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yam anena
XXsspp2_2u:1591: vihāreṇecchasi, avirahitaṃ cānena manasikāreṇa yad uta mahākaruṇā
XXsspp2_2u:1592: manasikāreṇa, evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā bodhisattvā
XXsspp2_2u:1593: bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? sarvasattvā hy āyuṣman subhūte 'virahitā
XXsspp2_2u:1595: subhūtir āha: sādhu sādhv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra upālapsye upālapsya iti.
XXsspp2_2u:1596: ata evāyuṣmatā śāradvatīputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā sattvābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā sattvāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, sattvaśūnyatayā manasikārāśūnyatā veditavyā, sattvaviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā, sattvān abhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārān abhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā.
XXsspp2_2u:1597: rūpāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā, rūpābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvanatā veditavyā, rūpāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā (ŚsP
XXsspp2_2u:1601: vedanābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, vedanāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, vedanāśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, vedanāviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1604: saṃjñābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, saṃjñāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, saṃjñāśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, saṃjnāviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1607: saṃskārābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, saṃskārāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, saṃskārāśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, saṃskārāviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1610: vijñānābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, vijñānāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, vijñānaśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, vijñānaviviktatayā manasikāravi viktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1613: cakṣurabhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, cakṣurasvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, cakṣuḥśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, cakṣurviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1616: śrotrābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, śrotrāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, śrotraśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, śrotraviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1619: 95) ghrāṇābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, ghrāṇāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, ghrāṇaśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, ghrāṇaviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1622: jihvābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, jihvāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, jihvāśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, jihvāviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1624: kāyāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā, kāyābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, kāyāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, kāyaśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā, kāyaviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā, kāyānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā,
XXsspp2_2u:1625: manosattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā, manobhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā, mano'svabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā
XXsspp2_2u:1630: rūpābhāvanatayā manasikārābhāvanatā veditavyā, rūpāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā, rūpaśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā,

XXsspp2_2u:2008: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahita eva tena manasikāreṇa veditavyaḥ, yad uta mahākaruṇāmanasikārena.
XXsspp2_2u:2009: atha bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt: sādhu sādhu subhūte,
XXsspp2_2u:2010: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā, yathā tvam upadiśasi yathāpi taṃ tathāgatasyānubhāvena evaṃ ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXsspp2_2u:2011: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ, yathā tvam upadiśasi. asmin khalu punaḥ
XXsspp2_2u:2013: āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāne ayam trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāram akaṃpat prākaṃpat saṃprākaṃpat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat,
XXsspp2_2u:2014: acarat prācarat saṃprācarat, akṣubhyat (ŚsP II-2 112) prākṣubhyat
XXsspp2_2u:2015: saṃprākṣubhyat, agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat, araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat, pūrvā dig avanamati sma, paścimā dig unnamati sma, pūrvā dig unnamati sma, paścimā dig avanamati sma, uttarā dig avanamati sma, dakṣiṇā dig unnamati sma, uttarā dig unnamati sma, dakṣiṇā dig avanamati sma,
XXsspp2_2u:2016: madhyeṣv avanamati sma, anteṣv unnamati sma, anteṣv avanamati sma,
XXsspp2_2u:2018: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādur akārṣīt.
XXsspp2_2u:2019: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasyāviṣkaraṇe?
XXsspp2_2u:2020: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
XXsspp2_2u:2021: imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante,
XXsspp2_2u:2022: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
XXsspp2_2u:2024: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimāyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
XXsspp2_2u:2026: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarāyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
XXsspp2_2u:2027: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarapūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
